hero.title: Experience Rumi: Your Culinary Journey, Reimagined.
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Rumi! Discover our exquisite menu and enjoy a seamless online ordering experience, crafted for your convenience and delight. No fuss, just flavor.

about.title: Savor the Taste of Rumi, Made for Everyone.
about.paragraph1: At Rumi, we believe exceptional food should always be easy to access. We've redesigned our online home to ensure that every dish, every flavor, is just a few clicks away. Browse our complete menu, customize your order with ease, and enjoy the convenience of ordering without any location barriers or technical hurdles. Our commitment to culinary excellence now comes with an online experience built for you.
about.paragraph2: Rumi is more than just a meal; it's a celebration of authentic flavors and a dedication to your satisfaction. From our kitchen to your table, we pour passion into every ingredient and preparation. With enhanced accessibility and a streamlined ordering process, we invite you to connect with the heart of Rumi and rediscover your favorite dishes, delivered with care and a user-friendly touch.
